commits.message:
EUCA-5519 Create new properties for cloud watch and reporting

cloud.monitor.DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL_MINS replaces reporting.DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL_MINS
The poll interval now serves as the cloud level interval for both reporting and cloud watch concerning
CC to CLC describe sensor responses.

Introduction of the cloud.monitor.HISTORY_SIZE property; max size 15 : min size 1

Cloud watch will now accept all history collected from the response from the CC.
The reporting events remain based on the last history item received by the CC.

General clean up
